sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react'; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function WordView(props) { const { wordName } = useParams(); const { word, setWord } = useState({}); const getWord = useCallback(() => { fetch(`localhost:5000/api/words/${wordName}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(setWord); }, [setWord, wordName]); useEffect( () => {getWord()}, [getWord] ); return <>

{word}

{ word.definition }
Score { word.score }
Alphagram { word.alphagram }
Front hooks { word.front_hooks }
Back hooks { word.back_hooks }
Anagrams { word.anagrams }
Probability 0.00000102% (rank 1729/1000000)
Playability 0.00000102% (rank 1729/1000000)
Frequency 0.0000000094039403%
Stems RETINA + S TISANE + R SATIRE + N

All data generated from Word Judge USA.

Made with ❤️ and ☕by S. Verona Malone.

; } export default WordView;
